title: Will the Summoner's Rift Winter Map be coming back this year?
body: I really do hope so, it honestly makes me so so so happy

replies.body: Camouflage for Tundra Hunter WW skin too.
I don't remember a year without it so they probably will. It will probably get here sometime next month.
what if Riot engineer accidentally deleted winter map

> [{quoted}](name=breakordoom444,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=WxqPgG0k,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-11-19T00:23:52.940+0000)
>
> what if Riot engineer accidentally deleted winter map

Yeah just like how they *accidentally* deleted Old Galio amirite.
Same its my favourite map. So warm and cozy. Makes me really appreciate league the music is soooo nice and soothing. I wish I could use this map forever.
